## Time series augmentation - shrink

```{r}
# TSPredIT
# version 1.0.767

source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cefet-rj-dal/tspredit/main/jupyter.R")

#loading TSPredIT
load_library("daltoolbox") 
load_library("tspredit") 
```

### Series for studying

```{r}
data(sin_data)
library(ggplot2)
plot_ts(x=sin_data$x, y=sin_data$y) + theme(text = element_text(size=16))
```

### Sliding windows

```{r}
sw_size <- 10
xw <- ts_data(sin_data$y, sw_size)
```

### Augment

```{r}
augment <- ts_aug_shrink()
augment <- fit(augment, xw)
xa <- transform(augment, xw)
idx <- attr(xa, "idx")
ts_head(xa)
```

### Plot

```{r}
i <- 1:nrow(xw)
y <- xw[,sw_size]
plot(x = i, y = y, main = "cosine")
lines(x = i, y = y, col="black")
for (j in 1:nrow(xa)) {
  lines(x = (idx[j]-sw_size+1):idx[j], y = xa[j,1:sw_size], col="green")
}
```
